name: Outs!
description:
Outs is a new kind of poker puzzle game that's easy to play & extremely challenging!

Without knowing the final card, fill up the board to make the best possible poker hands across & down at the same time. See how well you've done when the final cards are revealed!

Compete to be best! Check your ranking on the new leaderboards!

Peek the game behind the leaderboard score with 3D Touch (iPhone 6s/6sPlus) or a long press (iPad, iPod Touch, or other iPhone devices)

Supports bragging! Easily share hi-scores with friends.

Like the game? Leave us a snazzy review! :D

Feeling social? Hit us up!
